name: PaintTool SAI Version 2 Image
summary: An SAI2 file is a raster image created by PainTool SAI version 2, a lightweight painting application for Windows. It is saved in the SAI2 format, which is the second version of the SAI format used in .SAI files. The SAI2 file contains a drawing on a canvas created by the user, which consists of one or more independent editing layers. SAI2 files can be saved, closed, and reopened for further editing.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: SAI2 file open in SYSTEMAX PaintTool SAI Version 2
